The requirement is broken down into a firm 1.5 million litres of fuel with four options of up to 1 million litres each. The supply of fuel is required before 31 March 2025.

full_summary:
## F6854-230049-A Request for Proposal: Marine Fuel with Synthetic Hydrocarbon Components for CCG St. John's

The Department of Public Works and Government Services hereby invites Canadian and international suppliers to submit proposals for the supply and delivery of marine fuel with synthetic hydrocarbon components to the Canadian Coast Guard and Department of Fisheries and Oceans in St. John's, Newfoundland.

## Tender Details

* **Contract Reference Number:** WS4203599522-Doc4203635413
* **Competition ID:** F6854-230049-A
* **Publication Date:** September 11, 2023
* **Closing Date:** January 31, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST

## Tender Description

The Canadian Coast Guard and Department of Fisheries and Oceans require up to 5.5 million litres of blended marine fuel containing 50% by volume of synthetic hydrocarbon components by tank wagon. The tender is divided into a firm requirement of 1.5 million litres and four options of up to 1 million litres each. Delivery of the fuel must be completed before March 31, 2025.

## Contracting Entity

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services
* **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
* **Email:** [bobbi.macleod@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:bobbi.macleod@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Trade Agreements

This procurement is covered under the following trade agreements:

*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

## Contact Information

For further information or clarification please contact Bobbi MacLeod at the Department of Public Works and Government Services. [bobbi.m
